title: 110_hr2724
content: Retirement Savings for Working Americans Act - Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions relating to the tax credit for retirement savings contributions to: (1) require the Secretary of the Treasury to deposit saver's credit amounts directly into the designated retirement account of the taxpayer, (2) expand income eligibility levels for the saver's credit. (3) allow taxpayers that contribute to a qualified tuition program or a Coverdell education savings account to claim such contributions as retirement savings contributions. And (4) adjust the saver's credit maximum contribution amount for inflation beginning after 2007.
